messages.message: So, iirc the metrics go to rabbitmq first, and then are pushed to elastic by search-service, but I could be wrong. It’s possible that the automation metrics use a different mechanism than billing metrics, but I’m pretty sure they use the same mechanism. If you’re really stuck, I can dig in to it!
@prateek.tenkale what I'd recommend is (1) run a flow (2) look at the logs in celery-app-tasks and/or search-service to see if anything related to metrics shows up there; then you can hunt it down.
BTW, can you send me a sample payload for the API request that's used to render that consumption chart? That will help me pattern match :slightly_smiling_face:
